channel.title: One Square Meter
channel.description: A year-long biodiversity documetation of 1m² area in Gundmi, India.

item.title: Sighting: Tropical Fire Ant
item.description:
Tropical Fire Ant (Solenopsis geminata)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

Moves quite fast, hard to take good images.

Weather: 27.9°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Dusty Surface Beetle
item.description:
Dusty Surface Beetle (Gonocephalum adpressiforme)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

Hides under the shades of leaves.

Weather: 27.9°C, Overcast
